title: [JAP - PT-BR] Ultraman Tiga Complete ISO Pack
description:
Ultraman Tiga DVD volumes 1 to 13 (complete)
Episodes: 1 to 52
Audio: Japanese and Brazilian Portuguese
Subtitles: None
Format: ISO

With an ISO file, you can burn directly to a blank DVD or play it on your computer using a software like Daemon Tools.
